day_wise.desc: Pickup from the airport and transfer to the hotel.
Pickup from hotel for Ubud & Kintamani Volcano tour. Private tour with entry-fee included.
Pickup from the hotel and transfer to Aeera Villa. Day at Leisure.
Nusa Penida East & West combination tour with lunch (Auth/Diamond beach), tree house, Thousand Island view point, Kelingking Beach, Broken Beach, Angel Billabong
Pickup from hotel and transfer to the airport for a flight back home.
Arrival and drop off to the hotel.
Full day tour of watersports (banana boat, jet ski, parasailing), and Uluwatu Temple (Easy)
Full day tour of Tanah Lot temple, Alas Kedaton monkey forest, Petitenget temple.
Transfer to Ubud hotel/villa
Kintamani tour with Mount Batur view point, Cantik coffee plantation, Tegalalang rice terraces, Tukad Cepung Falls
Drop off to the airport for a flight back home.
Arrival and drop off to the hotel.
Full day tour of watersports (banana boat, jet ski, parasailing), and Uluwatu Temple (Easy)
Full day tour of Tanah Lot temple, Alas Kedaton monkey forest, Petitenget temple.
Transfer to Ubud hotel/villa
Kintamani tour with Mount Batur view point, Cantik coffee plantation, Tegalalang rice terraces, Tukad Cepung Falls
Ubud shopping tour with Ubud art market, Celuk and Mas villages.
Drop off to the airport for a flight back home.
Arrival and drop to hotel.
Full day tour of watersports (banana boat, jet ski, parasailing) at Tanjung Benoa near Nusa Dua, and Uluwatu temple.
Bedugul tour with Wanagiri view point, Handara gate, Beratan temple, Tanah Lot temple (only from North Kuta).
1 hour Balinese massage for 1 pax with hotel transfers (minimum 2 pax required) + transfer to Ubud hotel/villa.
Kintamani tour with Mount Batur view point, Cantik coffee plantation, Tegalalang rice terraces, Tukad Cepung falls.
Day at leisure.
Drop off to the airport for a flight back home.
